Use the _config.yml to specify the rules for generating pages like this one (including name and template).

In the template, you have access to all the fields defined in data for the record, like, for instance:

Date,Company,Location,Title,Summary,Responsibilities,Skills,Min_Qualifications,Preferred_Qualifications

  • User Experience Lead
  • As a User Experience Lead, you will be part of a growing team responsible for guiding the vision of UX at Intel. You will interact cross organizationally and have an opportunity to work with really smart and enthusiastic people! While this position is not a management role, it is a leadership role. You will be expected to be a UX leader for design and provide direction and guidance to the team. You will act as a key catalyst in driving a culture of teamwork and innovation centered around the needs of our customers.
Additionally, you also have access to page.name, which is the filename of the page, that is: index.html.
